pages.text: $(1)It must be possible to automatically fill a Crucible with water. However, as often cited, its sides are too heavily warded to allow for the intrusion of pipes. $(br2)I've been inspired by the ability of Cauldrons to fill using Dripstone. Sadly, the enchantments of the Crucible cause each drop to evaporate before the next arrives...

$(1)What I need is a substance like a $(item)Sponge$(1), but more permissive, so as to let through enough water all at once. $(br2)Hang on, what am I doing? I'm an alchemist, I'll just invent a new substance! Applying the right Power to a $(item)Wet Sponge$(1) should bring about the effect I want.
